I unplugged my internet.  Nothing.  I've tried the Norton Power Eraser-it didn't detect anything.  I've tried the Norton Removal Tool program.  Same problem.  Ran the NTR to purge any old Norton programs.  And I get the same installation failed problem.  Do you have any suggestions besides doing a fresh install of Windows 7(86x)?  Which is a last resort.  I was able to installed NIS 2011 v18.5.0.125 with the NTR 3.3.1 & I got the 120 day subscription!

**Problem** Hey Robbing Hood, first id like to thank you for this great upload and like all your others it works perfectly, my problem is that when I installed Norton I had forgotten to use the crack and i let the trial get used up... now usually I just uninstall Norton then reinstall it so I can access the setting to turn off the tamper protection. but when I uninstalled and reinstalled it still claims that the product is used up... ! I booted in safe mode and uninstalled and reinstalled but still it is telling me I need to buy the product! Can you please give me a solution to this as I have looked for hours now but cant seem to find anything... :( 
Hope you get back to me soon, 
      Thanks,
            Me!
